about_the_game:
Outfit your Ship

Prepare with the perfect blend of weaponry! Choose between heavy weapons to ravage turrets or lighter weapons to spray down scouting enemy parties. Change stats with ship components! Tank up to take on the whole army or become so offensive that they won’t be even able to see you coming. Experiment and make your perfect ship!

Naval Fleet Combat

Dive into the universe of naval space combat. The enemy is well established in your sector with scouting parties, defense turrets, and heavy ships that vastly outperform your own. That being said, you’re now the captain of your own unique battlecruiser and a tried and tested crew. With your skill and their experience combined, victory is almost guaranteed!

Narrative

As a recently promoted captain, you’ve been relocated to be at the forefront of the revolution. Lead a special operation – one that has the power to turn the entire conflict on its head. It is up to you to prove that there is still hope for an end to this war. Learn the details through your military briefings and slowly put together the full context of the Catolia civil war and its rich history. Learn and untangle the stories of your crew and your enemies to get to the heart of the rift tearing this system apart. Your mission? Fight for freedom or die trying.

name: Riptide

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3 10100F 3.6GHz 4 Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX™ 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-10700K (8-core/16-thread, @3.80GHz, 3792 Mhz)
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 2080 Super 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: In Riptide, gear up your ship, customize your loadout, and fight for the fleet! Riptide is a spaceship combat game with an emphasis on powerful customizations and utility. Accomplish your mission by loading up and taking out the enemy.
